author: Reuters
title: Russian border becomes China's frontline in fight against second virus wave
description: Having largely stamped out domestic transmission of the disease, China has been slowly easing curbs on movement as it tries to get its economy back on track, but there are fears that a rise in imported cases could spark a second wave of COVID-19. A total of 1…
content: SUIFENHE, China: China's northeastern border with Russia has become a frontline in the fight against a resurgence of the coronavirus epidemic as new daily cases rose to the highest in nearly six weeks - with more than 90 per cent involving people coming from … [+2716 chars]
